content.question: Which of the following best explains the high turnout in Iranian elections in 2009?

choices.label: The Green Revolution had taken place during the 2005 election, and people were still inspired to participate.
There was intense political competition between President Ahmadinejad and reformist candidates, which increased turnout.
Before the election, the supreme leader publicly called on all citizens to vote for presidential candidate Mir-Hossein Mousavi.
The referendum on whether or not to nationalize the oil industry brought citizens to the polls.

content.answer: There was intense political competition between President Ahmadinejad and reformist candidates, which increased turnout.

topic.text: 3.5: Nature and Role of Political Participation

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
